projects.name: AWS GLUE ETL PROJECT: CSV TO PARQUET
projects.description: Create an S3 bucket, upload a CSV file, and configure an IAM role for AWS Glue. Set up a database and table in AWS Glue using a crawler to infer the CSV schema. Configure and run an ETL job to transform the CSV file to Parquet format, then verify the output in S3

projects.name: 3-TIER ARCHITECTURE DEPLOYMENT ON AWS
projects.description: Includes presentation, application, and data tiers for UI, processing, and storage. Reduces development time, improves scalability, and enhances reliability and security. Promotes better teamwork and resource utilization.

projects.name: UNIVERSITY MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
projects.description: Developed key features to boost student retention and faculty productivity. Enhanced security, reducing data breaches. Delivered a user-friendly system, improving productivity and query performance.
